src:
Harga Tiket IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 Rp 25 Ribu, Ini Keseruannya
01 Nov 2019, 08:56 by Tempo.co, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Dyandra Promosindo, penyelenggara telah melakukan berbagai persiapan dengan pihak-pihak yang terlibat menjelang penyelenggaraan IIMS Motobike Expo 2019. Pameran ini akan diikuti oleh beberapa brand roda dua yang berpartisipasi diantaranya Benelli, BMW Motorrad, Cleveland, Husqvarna, Kawasaki, KTM, Piaggio, Vespa, Yamaha dan beberapa brand APM lagi yang akan memberi konfirmasi partisipasi jelang penyelenggaraan.
Industri otomotif tak akan bisa lepas dari dunia modifikasi. Perubahan desain, peningkatan kenyamanan hingga penambahan performa menjadi sajian yang selalu disuguhkan oleh dunia modifikasi. Dan semua itu tersaji di ajang IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 dalam program Motobike Parade & Catwalk. Pengunjung akan disuguhi pertunjukkan menarik dimana kendaraan special (custom, modifikasi & limited edition) para exhibitor tidak hanya bisa dilihat di booth masing – masing, selama tiga hari pameran pengunjung akan disuguhi parade & catwalk motor jagoan APM yang akan melenggok mengelilingi pameran sampai ke panggung utama.
Dari sisi industri aksesoris, merek-merek yang hadir meramaikan IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 antara lain Alpinestars, Arai, Astra Otoparts, Brisk Busi, Cargloss, Deus Ex Machina, Elders Company, Komine, Nolan, Ohlins, Proliner, R9, RCB, RS, Shinko, SHOEI, Street Art Custom, Taichi, Uma, V-Rossi, dan Von Dutch serta berbagai merek kondang lainnya.
Menempati area seluas 40.000 meter persegi menjadikan IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 begitu luas untuk dijelajahi. Karenanya, pihak penyelenggara IIMS Motobike Expo telah menyiapkan berbagai fasilitias pendukung yang sengaja disiapkan untuk menjadikan pengalaman mengunjungi pameran otomotif ini menjadi menyenangkan. Khusus untuk mengisi perut, di IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 ini juga terdapat area food court yang menyediakan berbagai pilihan kuliner seperti Bakmi GM, Chatime, Cupbob, Sushi Tei, Yoshinoya. Terdapat juga Food Truck seperti Bakso Afung, Bebek Dower, Donner Kebab, Es Teller 77, Hokben King of Kebab dan berbagai jenis pilihan kuliner lainnya
Program-program unggulan IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 akan menghadirkan tiga macam acara, yaitu program indoor, program outdoor, serta program sosial. Salah satu program yang selalu mendapatkan perhatian adalah adalah Test Ride. Di IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 area test ride tersedia di pintu masuk setelah ticket box.
Mengawali ajang IIMS Motobike Expo hari Sabtu (30/11) pada pagi hari akan dilakukan kegiatan Satmori dengan Universitas Budi Luhur. Kemudian di siang hari Dyandra Promosindo bekerja sama dengan naikmotor.com, mengajak komunitas lady bikers untuk ikut serta dalam kegiatan Riding Lady Bikers. Untuk kegiatan ini, peserta terutama para wanita bisa berkumpul di The Gade Coffee & Cold, Wijaya, Jakarta Selatan kemudian bersama-sama touring menuju lokasi pameran IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 di Istora Senayan, Jakarta.
Tak hanya sampai disitu, sore harinya akan dilaksanakan kembali kegiatan Afternoon Riding. Kali ini menggandeng komunitas Motovillager yang bermarkas di Motovillage, Kemang. 100 peserta pertama yang beruntung, akan berkesempatan untuk mengikuti acara Motobike BBQ Night yang akan disediakan sesampainya peserta di venue.
Satu lagi area yang dapat menjadi inspirasi bagi pengunjung yang mencintai modifikasi adalah The Fantasy World. Area The Fantasy World terletak di samping kiri Motobike Main Stage. The Fantasy World dibangun oleh tim Biker’s Station dan menampilkan beberapa sepeda motor modifikasi.
Kemeriahan terus berlanjut sampai malam. Bagi pecinta musik, Motobike Main Stage akan menjadi salah satu pusat kegiatan hiburan IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 ini. Motobike Main Stage menyuguhkan performa band-band keren. Pada hari Jumat (29/11), pengunjung akan dihibur dengan kehadiran Kelompok Penerbang Roket. Riot Club akan hadir pada hari Sabtu (30/11) dan band indie pendatang baru .Feast akan tampil pada hari ketiga IIMS Motobike Expo 2019.
Tak ketinggalan, sebagai bentuk kegiatan sosial, pada tanggal 1 Desember 2019 bertepatan dengan Hari AIDS Sedunia, penyelenggara IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 bekerja sama dengan komunitas motor baik dan Yayasan AIDS Indonesia menyelenggarakan aksi White Riding. Melalui kegiatan ini akan dilakukan penjualan jenis aksesoris yang keuntungannya akan didonasikan dan diharapkan dapat memberikan dukungan kepada teman-teman yang terjangkit HIV/AIDS.
Lebih special lagi, pengunjung yang melakukan transaksi di ajang IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 ini memiliki kesempatan untuk menukarkan kupon undian dengan transaksi minimal Rp 100 ribu dan berlaku kelipatan. Jangan lupa bertransaksi kalau datang ke IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 dan menangkan hadiah grand prize berupa 1 unit Kawasaki W 175.
Mulai 29 November hingga 1 Desember 2019, IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 akan diselenggarakan nyaris di seluruh area Istora Senayan. Pameran terbuka untuk umum setiap hari pukul 10.00 – 22.00 WIB di hari Jumat dan Minggu, serta pukul 10.00 – 00.00 WIB di hari Sabtu dengan HTM Rp 25 ribu. Bagi pengunjung yang datang berkelompok, IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 menyediakan group ticket untuk 4 orang dengan harga Rp. 75 ribu.
text:
IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 Ticket Price IDR 25 thousand, This is fun
01 Nov 2019, 08:56 by Tempo.co, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Dyandra Promosindo, the organizers have made various preparations with the parties involved ahead of the 2019 IIMS Motobike Expo. The exhibition will be followed by several participating two-wheel brands including Benelli, BMW Motorrad, Cleveland, Husqvarna, Kawasaki, KTM, Piaggio, Vespa, Yamaha and several other APM brands that will confirm participation ahead of the event.
The automotive industry will not be able to escape from the world of modification. Design changes, increased comfort to the addition of performance is a dish that is always served by the world of modifications. And all of that is presented at the IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 in the Motobike Parade & Catwalk program. Visitors will be treated to interesting shows where the special vehicles (custom, modification & limited edition) of the exhibitors can not only be seen at their respective booths, during the three days of the exhibition visitors will be treated to a parade & catwalk motorbike APM champion who will wander around the exhibition up to the main stage .
From the accessories industry side, the brands that were present enlivened the IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 including Alpinestars, Arai, Astra Otoparts, Brisk Busi, Cargloss, Deus Ex Machina, Elders Company, Komine, Nolan, Ohlins, Proliner, R9, RCB, RS, RS Shinko, SHOEI, Street Art Custom, Taichi, Uma, V-Rossi, and Von Dutch as well as various other famous brands.
Occupying an area of 40,000 square meters makes the IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 so vast to explore. Therefore, the organizer of the IIMS Motobike Expo has prepared a variety of supporting facilities that are deliberately prepared to make the experience of visiting this automotive exhibition enjoyable. Specifically to fill the stomach, at the IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 there is also a food court area that provides a variety of culinary choices such as Bakmi GM, Chatime, Cupbob, Sushi Tei, Yoshinoya. There are also Food Trucks such as Meatballs Afung, Duck Dower, Donner Kebab, Es Teller 77, Hokben King of Kebab and various other types of culinary choices
IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 flagship programs will present three kinds of events, namely indoor programs, outdoor programs, and social programs. One program that always gets attention is the Test Ride. At IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 the test ride area is available at the entrance after the ticket box.
Starting the IIMS Motobike Expo on Saturday (11/30) in the morning, Satmori activities will be held with Budi Luhur University. Then in the afternoon Dyandra Promosindo cooperates with Naikmotor.com, inviting the lady bikers community to take part in Riding Lady Bikers activities. For this activity, participants, especially women, can gather at The Gade Coffee & Cold, Wijaya, South Jakarta and then travel together to the IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 exhibition location at Istora Senayan, Jakarta.
Not only that, the afternoon will be held again Afternoon Riding activities. This time cooperating with the Motovillager community based in Motovillage, Kemang. The first 100 participants who were lucky, will have the opportunity to take part in the Motobike BBQ Night event that will be provided when the participants arrive at the venue.
Another area that can be an inspiration for visitors who love modification is The Fantasy World. The Fantasy World area is located on the left side of the Motobike Main Stage. The Fantasy World was built by the Biker’s Station team and featured several motorcycle modifications.
The excitement continued into the night. For music lovers, Motobike Main Stage will become one of the 2019 IIMS Motobike Expo entertainment activities centers. Motobike Main Stage presents the performance of cool bands. On Friday (11/29), visitors will be entertained by the presence of the Rocket Aviation Group. Riot Club will be present on Saturday (30/11) and the newcomer indie band. Feast will be performing on the third day of the IIMS Motobike Expo 2019.
Not to forget, as a form of social activity, on December 1, 2019 to coincide with World AIDS Day, organizers of the IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 collaborated with both the motorcycle community and the Indonesian AIDS Foundation to organize the White Riding action. Through this activity sales of accessories will be made, the profits will be donated and expected to provide support to friends who are infected with HIV / AIDS.
Even more special, visitors who make transactions at the 2019 IIMS Motobike Expo have the opportunity to redeem lottery coupons with transactions of at least Rp 100,000 and apply multiples. Don't forget to trade if you come to IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 and win a grand prize in the form of 1 unit of Kawasaki W 175.
From 29 November to 1 December 2019, the IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 will be held in almost all areas of Istora Senayan. The exhibition is open to the public every day at 10:00 - 22:00 West Indonesia Time on Friday and Sunday, and at 10:00 - 00:00 West Indonesia Time on Saturday with HTM of Rp. 25 thousand. For visitors who come in groups, IIMS Motobike Expo 2019 provides group tickets for 4 people at a price of Rp. 75 thousand.
